dcterms:description: A popular dataset for object detection, consisting of 118,287 training samples with 849,947 objects and 5,000 test samples with 36,335 objects, belonging to 80 classes divided into 12 super-classes.
dcterms:title: COCO dataset

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for instance segmentation in aerial images, containing 36,038 training samples with 716,640 objects and 11,752 test samples with 233,625 objects, belonging to 15 classes divided into two super-classes.
dcterms:title: iSAID dataset
